alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 12:46PM PDT until March 24 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 8 AM PDT FRIDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 8 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
